original_title: Terry Gilliam's Benvenuto Cellini - English National Opera
overview: Musical - Terry Gilliam's inexhaustible imagination is unleashed on the outrageous autobiography of celebrated 16-century goldsmith and sculptor Benvenuto Cellini. -  Michael Spyres, Corinne Winters, Willard White
title: Terry Gilliam's Benvenuto Cellini - English National Opera
